## Tidyverse 

```{r, eval=F}
dat <- read_csv("Example_data/Ch3_chb.csv") 
dat1 <- dat #원본 보존
```

```{r}
dat1 %>% 
  select(id, b_alt, b_bil, b_alb) %>% 
  print(n=4)

dat1 %>% 
  select(-id, -index_date) %>% 
  colnames()

dat1 %>% 
  select(b_alt, m6_alt, m12_alt) %>% 
  print(n=4)

dat1 %>% 
  select(contains('m6')) %>% 
  print(n=4)

dat1 %>% 
  rename(sex=gender) %>% 
  print(n=4)
```
